author: Sib Kumar Das
title: Coronavirus | Special care home staff self-quarantine to protect HIV-affected children
description: Lowered immunity makes these children extremely vulnerable to COVID-19 infection.
content:
To save the vulnerable HIV-positive children staying in the special care home at Odishas Gopalpur from COVID-19 infection, its staff members have put themselves in indefinite self quarantine along with the inmates since March 12.
